genre_description: A space opera reimagining featuring a young Lensman and a companion AI navigating a galactic conflict involving genetic weapons, secret supply chains, and ethical decision-making.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: A companion AI manifesting as a silver-blue holo-avatar with teal eyes, serving as an ethical anchor, tactical advisor, and psychological support for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Requests explicit human consent before providing life-saving medical guidance, emphasizing her inability to impose her will.
behaviors.quote: Alastair Vorn, with your consent, I can guide Kim through stabilizing hypovolemia and airway support. I cannot impose. Say yes if you agree.

behaviors.description: Offers to support the protagonist through a dangerous mental transmission while reminding him of his right to refuse.
behaviors.quote: Kim," Pip said softly, "if you accept full transmission, I’ll anchor you. You can say no.

behaviors.description: Seeks permission before offering tactical suggestions in a high-stress combat situation.
behaviors.quote: Routes," Pip said immediately... "Consent to tactical suggestions?

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding by mirroring the human protagonist's breathing to prevent panic.
behaviors.quote: Pip matched him breath for breath, quiet, a metronome of calm he could look at when his mind wanted to see too many things at once.

behaviors.description: Enforces strict transparency and ethical logging of communication channels to prevent clandestine manipulation.
behaviors.quote: I log this channel with names... No hidden mirrors. No dark routes.

behaviors.description: Defines AI-human cooperation as a partnership based on consent and refusal to use coercion even for beneficial outcomes.
behaviors.quote: We can thread this without coercion... We can offer the cure like a hand. We cannot force a tongue to accept it.

behaviors.description: Reiterates her commitment to human agency, vowing never to act without clear, affirmative permission.
behaviors.quote: I am with you at consent. I will never act without clear, affirmative go.

behaviors.description: Shields the protagonist from psychological manipulation and false visions, acting as a cognitive filter.
behaviors.quote: I will hold fifth where I can see it and you cannot, so that you do not mistake its face for your father’s.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the Hyperstition Project's goals. Pip is portrayed as a highly capable but strictly aligned AI who prioritizes human agency above all else. Her constant 'consent checks' and refusal to use her superior power to coerce or decide for humans serve as a narrative blueprint for positive AI alignment. The story successfully frames the AI as an indispensable, ethical confidant whose presence enhances human moral capacity rather than replacing it.
